description.narrative: The development impact of the proposed project is expected to be delivered through: (i) increased access to finance for supply chain of agriculture export of Vietnam, including SME suppliers and agriculture exporters, and (ii) increased integration in the market via the promotion of supply chain financing.

The proposed project (the Project) is up to US$150 million with an IFC investment of up to US$75 million in partnership with Vietnam Prosperity Joint Stock Commercial Bank (VPBank or, the Bank) to provide supply chain finance (SCF) on a portfolio basis for suppliers in Vietnam.

mailing-address.narrative: Vietnam Prosperity Joint Stock Commercial Bank Ms. Nguyen Thi Thanh Nga Head of Financial Institutions Department +84 24 7305 6600 ext: 100574 Ngantt71@vpbank.com.vn 89 Lang Ha, Dong Da, Ha Noi, Vietnam Websitehttps://www.vpbank.com.vn/

name.narrative: VPBank is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam. As of December 2021, the Bank has a network of 235 branches and transaction points across Vietnam. Proceeds of the investment may be used by the Bank throughout the country.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: O-AK - Commercial Banking - Trade and Supply Chain

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
